derivation.yuyuan_name: First World War (originally Anglo-Indian): from Urdu ḵushī 'pleasure', from Persian ḵuš

entry.tran: 轻松愉快的;安逸的;不费劲的
entry.def: A cushy job or situation is pleasant because it does not involve much work or effort.

means.word_mean: 1. not burdensome or demanding; borne or done easily and without hardship;
